duties_responsibilities.duty: Maximize sales, effective planning and order-writing
Support and complete incidental activities such as merchandising, shelving, and pricing
Act as a sales expert to retail stores and partner with nationally recognized customers such as Walmart, Kroger, Target, etc.
Develop and maintain complete knowledge of Mondelēz International, primarily Nabisco products, sales systems, and procedures
Ensure leading brands are well represented, stocked, and maintained through the implementation of Mondelēz’ guidelines
Tailor programs and fact-based sales presentations to the customer's needs to drive Mondelēz International and customer growth
Develop strong business relationships with store management to provide service and value beyond the customer's expectations
Work in conjunction with the Merchandiser to ensure inventory is fully stocked, always rotated and presentable; as well as properly credit and dispose of all unsalable merchandise from all stores
Monitor and report on competitive activity and document all pricing activities
Be a collaborator between Customer Business teams and customer’s store management

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required, college degree highly preferred.
